history.text: hello
Hi
so you have read about a movie?
Yes a little.
do you need more time or are you ready to talk about it
I'm ready. The movie is The Avengers.
ok great! i wish it was one i did not know so much about but I will set that aside haha
could you tell me about it
Haha. It was released in 2012 and it is a superhero movie.
The characters are based on the Marvel Comics characters
oh nice, so there are several heros?
Yes, Iron man, Captain America, The Hulk, Black Widow, and Hawkeye to name a few.
do they work together as a team or separate
They start start out a little separated but have to come together to fight a threat from Thor's brother Loki.
so loki is the villian?
Yes Loki is the main villain in the movie.
is there any comedy in the movie
Yes there is. The director is Joss Whedon and most of his movies always have comedy.
thats great! i love some comedy, so i am guessing it has a lot of action because it is superheros but am i right in that assumption
Yes there is a lot of action.
are the avengers all male or female or a mix
There is a mix. Most of them are males but you have Black Widow and one shield agent who is kind of part of the team.
oh good, I bet that makes it more interesting. where is the movie set?
like what city
There are many cities but the main battle is in New York city.
I thats exciting! I live in nyc so that really makes me interested to watch it and see if things look familiar. Do the avengers work well together?
Things are rough between them at first but by the end of the movie they are working well as a team.
rough because of personality clashes or what?
Yes Iron Man has a hard time working with the other teammates. They all have strong personalities which makes it a little hard at first. Also Loki does his best to divide them.
that makes sense, speaking of loki, is that hard for thor to fight his brother?
oh it looks like we can finish the conversation, thank you so much for telling me about the movie!
thank you

uid1response.feedback: I have seen this movie so it was a bit hard to set that aside but they made it seem interesting
